sourcesContent:
import { Component, ElementRef, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.scss'] }) export class HomeComponent { @ViewChild('menuSection') menuSection!: ElementRef; menuActive = false; toggleMenu() { this.menuActive = !this.menuActive; } scrollToMenu() { document.querySelector('.menu')?.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } } Cafe Home Page
